AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account.

TimePeriod.description: The time period covered by the reported data.

AdDistribution.description: Where the ads were displayed, e.g., search, audience network, native, etc.

DeviceType.description: Type of device where the ad was displayed, e.g., mobile, desktop, etc.

Network.description: Network where the ad was displayed.

DeliveredMatchType.description: Type of the match for delivered ads.

DeviceOS.description: Operating system of the device where the ad was displayed.

TopVsOther.description: Performance comparison between top and other ad positions.

BidMatchType.description: The type of bid match used, e.g., exact, broad, etc.

AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account.

CampaignType.description: Type of the campaign, e.g., search, shopping, etc.

CampaignStatus.description: Status of the campaign, e.g., active, paused, etc.

Spend.description: Total amount spent on the campaign.

QualityScore.description: Quality score of the ad shown.

AdRelevance.description: Relevance score of the ad shown.

LandingPageExperience.description: User experience of the landing page.

PhoneImpressions.description: Number of impressions with a phone number shown.

PhoneCalls.description: Number of phone calls generated by the ad.

Assists.description: Number of assists provided in the conversion path.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: Return on ad spend for tracked conversions.

CustomParameters.description: Custom parameters associated with the ad.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: Return on ad spend for all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: Overall conversion rate for all conversions.

AllRevenue.description: Total revenue generated from all conversions.

AveragePosition.description: Average position of the ad when displayed.

LowQualityClicks.description: Number of clicks on low-quality traffic sources.

LowQualityImpressions.description: Number of impressions from low-quality traffic sources.

LowQualitySophisticatedClicks.description: Number of sophisticated clicks on low-quality traffic sources.

LowQualityConversions.description: Number of conversions from low-quality clicks.

Revenue.description: Total revenue generated from tracked conversions.

BudgetName.description: Name of the budget associated with the campaign.

BudgetStatus.description: Status of the budget, e.g., active, paused, etc.
